roleset.name: spraypaint on a surface
roleset.note: SPRAYPAINT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spraypaint' based on frame file for 'paint'. Verbnetclasses 24 and 25.2.Frame created by Arrick (from spraypaint.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: spraypaint
example.text: For example, on Nokia model which *T* has a shell that *T* is easily replaced * is hot with teenagers, some of whom *T* even go so far as [*]-3 to spraypaint their phones [*]-3 to make them 'different.'
